title: Lichterkinder
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Lichterkinder auf dieser Erde
lines.translation: Children of light on this earth
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Leuchten wie Sterne am Himmelszelt
lines.translation: Shining like stars in the sky
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: So wie Sankt Martin schenken sie Freude
lines.translation: Just like Saint Martin, they bring joy
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: In alle Herzen auf dieser Welt
lines.translation: To all hearts in this world
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Lichterkinder auf dieser Erde
lines.translation: Children of light on this earth
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Leuchten wie Sterne am Himmelszelt
lines.translation: Shining like stars in the sky
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: So wie Sankt Martin schenken sie Freude
lines.translation: Just like Saint Martin, they bring joy
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: In alle Herzen auf dieser Welt
lines.translation: To all hearts in this world
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Es ist kalt in der Nacht, kein Mensch unterwegs
lines.translation: It's cold at night, no one around.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Alle sind zu Hause und haben es bequem
lines.translation: Everyone is at home and comfortable.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Sankt Martin reitet auf seinem Pferd durch den Schnee
lines.translation: Saint Martin rides his horse through the snow
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Es ist dunkel und kalt, er kann kaum was sehen
lines.translation: It is dark and cold; he can hardly see anything.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Am Straßenrand sieht er einen Mann
lines.translation: He sees a man at the side of the road.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Der wimmert leise: "Ich friere und bin krank"
lines.translation: He whimpers softly: "I'm cold and sick"
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Martin nimmt seinen Mantel und teilt ihn durch zwei
lines.translation: Martin takes his coat and cuts it in half.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Und Dank der zwei Hälften hat es für beide gereicht
lines.translation: And thanks to the two halves, there was enough for both.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Lichterkinder auf dieser Erde
lines.translation: Children of light on this earth
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Leuchten wie Sterne am Himmelszelt
lines.translation: Shining like stars in the sky
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: So wie Sankt Martin schenken sie Freude
lines.translation: Just like Saint Martin, they bring joy
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: In alle Herzen auf dieser Welt
lines.translation: To all hearts in this world
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Es ist kalt in der Nacht, kein Mensch unterwegs
lines.translation: It's cold at night, no one around.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Wir sind zu Hause und haben es bequem
lines.translation: We are at home and comfortable.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Doch so gut wie wir hat es nicht jeder auf der Welt
lines.translation: But not everyone in the world is as fortunate as we are.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Vielen fehlt es an Essen, fehlt es an Geld
lines.translation: Many lack food, many lack money
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Wir zünden ein Licht an, dann geht vielen ein Licht auf
lines.translation: We light a candle, and then many will see the light.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Teilen wie Sankt Martin, weil jemand auch dich braucht
lines.translation: Sharing like Saint Martin, because someone needs you too
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Lichterkinder bringen Lächeln in Gesichter
lines.translation: Children of light bring smiles to faces
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Singt dieses Lied und zeigt eure Lichter
lines.translation: Sing this song and show your lights
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.translation: Children of light on this earth

lines.translation: Just like Saint Martin, they bring joy

lines.text: In alle Herzen auf dieser Welt
lines.translation: To all hearts in this world
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Laternen und Lichter bringen Wärme in die Welt
lines.translation: Lanterns and lights bring warmth to the world.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Leuchten wie Sterne am Himmelszelt
lines.translation: Shining like stars in the sky
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Für alle deren Leben dunkel und kalt ist
lines.translation: For all whose lives are dark and cold
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Voller Schatten, Angst und Gewalt ist
lines.translation: It is full of shadows, fear, and violence.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Wir teilen wie Sankt Martin, den Mantel und Geld
lines.translation: Like Saint Martin, we share our cloak and money.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Nächstenliebe, ist alles, was zählt
lines.translation: Love of one's neighbor is all that matters.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Lichterkinder bringen Lächeln in Gesichter
lines.translation: Children of light bring smiles to faces
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Singt dieses Lied und zeigt eure Lichter
lines.translation: Sing this song and show your lights
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Wir alle sind Lichterkinder
lines.translation: We are all children of light
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Es strahlen die Kerzen, Lichterkinder
lines.translation: The candles are shining, children of light.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Mit Liebe im Herzen, Lichterkinder
lines.translation: With love in our hearts, children of light
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Für alle Kinder dieser Welt
lines.translation: For all the children of this world
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.
